Premium Parquet Installation

Premium hardwood flooring installation in classic, designer, and modern styles — crafted with precision and care. We specialize in high-end parquet flooring installation for private homes, apartments, and commercial interiors.

Installation Styles

  • Herringbone Parquet

    Timeless geometry, suitable for classic and modern interiors.

  • Chevron Parquet (French Herringbone)

    Elegant, precise 45° cut — for premium architectural expression.

  • Designer / Panel Parquet

    Geometric floor art, crafted from pre-assembled modules.

  • Framed & Bordered Installation

    Details that elevate — contrasting borders and elegant framing.

  • Wide Plank Flooring

    Clean, natural, and spacious.

  • Staircase Cladding with Wood

    Seamless flow from floor to stairs.

Why Choose Us

  • ✓ Over 10 unique styles of installation
  • ✓ Professional preparation and subfloor leveling
  • ✓ Solid, engineered, and designer parquet installation
  • ✓ Premium finishing: Monocoat oil, BONA lacquer, and more
  • ✓ Dust-controlled zones for clean work
  • ✓ Tailored design solutions and layout planning
  • ✓ We work with your materials or supply our own

Premium Materials. Trusted Brands.

We work only with the best:

  • • Monocoat natural oil
  • • BONA water-based lacquer
  • • Multi-layer oak parquet, thermo wood, walnut
  • • Full glue-down or floating installation
  • • Plywood and sound insulation base

Our Installation Process

  1. On-site consultation and measurements
  2. Subfloor inspection and leveling
  3. Material selection and delivery
  4. Precise layout planning and installation
  5. Surface finishing: oil or lacquer
  6. Final quality check and handover

Parquet Installation Prices

  • Herringbone or Chevron Installation from €40–55 / m²
  • Designer / Panel Parquet from €65 / m²
  • Wide Plank Installation from €35–45 / m²
  • Staircase Cladding from €80 / stair
  • Framing and Border Detailing from €15–20 / m²

*Prices refer to labor only. Materials are quoted separately based on project requirements.
*Final pricing may vary based on project complexity and volume. Custom quotes available upon request.

Minimum order - from 20* sqm.

* if the order volume is less than 20 sqm. -
the cost and conditions are negotiated separately

Specify the Price

The best way to determine the cost of work is to consult with our specialists for consultation and estimation. You may also find it helpful to receive advice on material selection. We provide all consultations, advice, and estimates FOR FREE

About us

Parquet works in Kyiv and the Kyiv region is our main specialization. We perform old floor covering repair with the highest quality, to the point that you won't recognize it.
